member.name: ARP_SEND_REPLY
member.summary: The ARP_SEND_REPLY structure stores information about an Address Resolution Protocol (ARP) reply messages.

member.name: ARP_SEND_REPLY.DestAddress
member.summary: The destination IPv4 address to which the ARP message is sent, in the form of an structure.

member.name: ARP_SEND_REPLY.SrcAddress
member.summary: The source IPv4 address from which the ARP message is being transmitted, in the form of an structure.
